alert.note: Alert for Oneida; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 1:26PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lincoln, Vilas, Marathon and Oneida Counties this afternoon... At 122 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Medford, moving southeast at 40 mph. Other strong thunderstorms were located over northwest Wisconsin and will move into central Wisconsin later this afternoon. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wausau, Rib Mountain, Weston and Mosinee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
